p: At the late sampling date in 2009, population-mean soil moisture was positively correlated with mean leaf number ( r = 0.848, P = 0.002), mean inflorescence number ( r = 0.880, P ≤ 0.001) and mean reproductive output ( r = 0.864, P ≤ 0.001); and negatively correlated with mean population density ( r = 0.576, P = 0.081). These correlations were disproportionately influenced by one population with very high soil moisture (see Fig. 2A), and were no longer significant ( P > 0.2) when this population was removed from the analysis.
